desc: Fredmark Design believes in recreate and repurpose old clothing materials to new, we handmade new fashionable items like unisex fashion item, bags, backpacks, pets accessories, motorcycle accessories, masks, all can be customised and personalised. Also available in different materials like leather or waterproof.

layout.text: Every piece of Fredmark Design’s product is handcrafted by the creator of the brand with passion and love to make sure it is above perfection.
